subject: DR. MS. Susan Holm
body:
DR. MS. Susan Holm
Chief Financial Officer
PostFinance Bank AG
Mingerstrasse 20,
Bern, BE, 3030, Switzerland.
02/09/2024
For your attention
Please note that we have received a Memo from the office of the Permanent Secretary Federal Ministry of Finance where your funds originated from instructing us to return all unclaimed funds back to the source, the management of Post Finance Bank has directed that we notify all customers whose funds are still with us to make efforts to receive their funds or it will be returned back. We do not have the authority to retain such funds here with us, because we are only their correspondent bank.
Please get back to us urgently.
DR. MS. Susan Holm
Chief Financial Officer

subject: Re:   DR. MS. Susan Holm
body:
Hello Dr. Ms. Susan Holm,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding this matter. I must say, it's quite surprising to hear about these unclaimed funds. Could you please provide more details about this? For instance, how did my name come up in connection with these funds? And what is the process for claiming them?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Victoria

subject: For your attention Victoria,
body:
Dr. MS. Susan Holm
Chief Financial Officer
PostFinance Bank AG
Mingerstrasse 20,
Bern, BE, 3030, Switzerland.

For your attention Victoria,

Thank you for your message, and sorry for responding late. Your contract
file was forwarded to our bank for payment The Federal Ministry of Finance
Nigeria, we are a correspondence bank to the Central bank of Nigeria, and
we handle all their offshore payment. So your payment of $10.7 Million
Dollars originated from there.This payment file has been in our bank since
last year September, it has been processed waiting for you to reconfirm
your particulars.

We received a fresh memo from the Ministry of Finance Nigeria to return
back to the Central Bank of Nigeria all the unclaimed funds that is still
in our bank, if you are still interested in receiving your funds still with
us, you are advised to reconfirm your particulars to enable us do the
needful, and we will also notify the Ministry of Finance that you are ready
and willing to receive your payment.

Please get back to us

Dr. MS. Susan Holm

subject: Re: For your attention Victoria,
body:
Hello Dr. MS. Susan Holm,

Thank you for your response and the information provided. I'm quite interested in understanding more about this process. Could you please elaborate on how these funds came to be in your bank? Also, could you explain what steps I need to take to reconfirm my interest in receiving these funds?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Victoria

subject: Re: For your attention Victoria,
body:
Attention Victoria,

Thank you for your response. We have already notified you that we are
acting as the correspondence to the Federal Ministry of Finance Nigeria
where your funds originated from. This funds was first moved to another
correspondence bank, kuveytturkbank Bank (KTB) in Istanbul Turkey before it
was redirected to our bank because of delay, all this happened since 2023
September.

I don't understand how you are telling us that you are not aware that your
funds are with us, according to instructions from the originating Ministry
of Finance, this is a contract that you or your company executed and has
not been paid.

The step to follow is first your will reconfirm your particulars including
your nominated bank account where the funds will be credited, once we
receive your particulars, we will apply to the  European Banking Authority
(EBA) for a payment clearance, this is because any payment originating from
Africa that is above one Million,  European Banking Authority (EBA) must
give their clearance before any bank in Europe will make such a payment.

Once we get a clearance from them, we will process and credit your
nominated bank account. Please get back to me with the required information.

Dr. MS Susan Holm

subject: Re: For your attention Victoria,
body:
Hello Dr. Susan Holm,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's quite surprising to hear about these funds, as I don't recall executing any contract that would result in such a large sum of money. However, I'm intrigued by this situation and would like to understand more.

Could you please provide me with more information about the contract or company that supposedly executed it? Also, could you clarify why the funds were moved from Nigeria to Turkey and then redirected to your bank?

I appreciate your assistance in this matter and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Victoria

subject: Re: For your attention Victoria,
body:
After a brief meeting of the board of directors, I have been directed to
return the payment file that bears your name back to where it originated
from, we cannot keep giving out information to you while you have proven
that the payment does not belong to you. such amount of money is not what
we will pay to someone that is not sure that it belongs to her, please note
that the file will be returned back to the Federal Ministry of Finance
Abuja Nigeria.

Thank you

Dr. MS. Susan Holm

subject: Re: For your attention Victoria,
body:
Hello Dr. MS. Susan Holm,

Thank you for your message. I'm a bit confused about the situation, could you please explain it to me in simpler terms? What exactly is this payment file that bears my name? And why would it be returned back to the Federal Ministry of Finance Abuja Nigeria?

I'm sorry for any inconvenience caused, I just want to understand the situation better.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Victoria

subject: Re: For your attention Victoria,
body:
Please a contract payment that originated from the Federal Ministry of
Finance Nigeria was forwarded to my bank for payment, it was a contract
executed in Nigeria, the Job was done at Nigeria National Petroleum
Corporation and the contract is valued at $10.7 Million, i don't know what
else you want me to tell you, if you are not interested in receiving the
funds we will return it back from where it originated from, the payment
file is a payment instruction directing us to settle the contractor that
has completed his/her job and has not been paid.

Please there is no risk involved in the payment, you are not the only
payment we are instructed to pay, we have more than thirteen payment files
from the Federal Ministry of Finance, we are their correspondence bank, we
handle all their foreign payments.

All we need from you is for you to reconfirm your particulars to us, this
will show that you are the real person, you have nothing to fear, there is
no risk involved. If you cannot receive it in your bank account for
security reason, we will create an online bank account in our bank, and you
can transfer the funds to any bank of your choice in bits

But if you delay, my bank will return the funds back to where it came from,
it is a clear bank payment.

Dr. MS. Susan Holm

subject: Re: For your attention Victoria,
body:
Hello Dr. MS. Susan Holm,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the contract payment from the Federal Ministry of Finance Nigeria. It's quite interesting to know that such a large amount of money is involved in this transaction.

I'm curious, how did my name come up in relation to this contract? I don't recall having any business dealings with the Nigeria National Petroleum or any other Nigerian entity for that matter.

Also, could you please elaborate on the process of creating an online bank account? How does it work and what are the steps involved?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Victoria

subject: Re: For your attention Victoria,
body:
Hello Dr. MS. Susan Holm,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the contract payment from the Federal Ministry of Finance Nigeria. It's quite interesting to learn about the work done at Nigeria National Petroleum and how it's valued at a million.

I'm curious, though, how did my name come up in this? I don't recall having any business dealings in Nigeria or with the petroleum industry. Could there be a mix-up somewhere?

Also, could you please elaborate more on the process of creating an online bank account? How does transferring funds in bits work exactly?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Victoria
